track.name: Little Girl Blue
comments: Like this classical piano version of an great soul artist.
Miss NINA from Money makin Mount Vernon, NY. Remeber her back in her hey day driving her big Benz all over Westchester....miss you Miss Nina....

I think i like the remix a bit better, but both are really lovely songs... though they always make me think of Christmas out of season. (Because the piano tune starts off the same as, you know, Good King Wenceslas >_>)
Nobody like the Sublime Ms Simone...nothing like her before...nothing like her after
there was alittle girl who had a little curl ...................:)
she is my favorite jazz vocalist all around. and her piano skills are master too. she loved johann sebastian bach. her dream was to be a classical piano player. she trained for many, many years...
Love her voice and the piano tune!
